Package presentationLayer

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddCustomerController
    Controller class used for inserting customer
    AddProductController
    Controller class used for inserting product
    Controller
    Controller class used for the main stage of the application and for managing the choice of the next stage
    CustomersController
    Controller class used for the customers management stage
    DeleteCustomerController
    Controller class used for deleting customer
    DeleteProductController
    Controller class used for inserting product
    EditCustomerController
    Controller class used for editing customer
    EditProductController
    Controller class used for editing product
    FxmlLoader
    Class used for generating pane objects
    Interface  
    ObjectsController<T>
    Controller class used for creating tables through a reflection mechanism
    OrdersController
    Controller class used for orders management
    ProductsController
    Controller class used for products management stage
    TableCustomersController
    Controller class used for the customers table to be displayed
    TableProductsController
    Controller class used for the products table to be displayed
